message: I've installed Windows 8 but what I hated most and most users will hate that now there is no Start button! anyone agree? or disagree?

data.message:
1)stolen ideas from linux & mac os
2)new UI not practical on PCs
3)UI suitable only for tablets
4)gonna be slow on tablets 
5)typical microsoftish failure
Also hated the big ugly start word on home screen, they should put a metro styled windows button canvas !
